sn22.79:4.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaramānā anussaranti sabbete pañcupādānakkhandhe anussaranti etesaṃ vā aññataraṃ.
sn22.79:4.5: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno rūpaṃyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:4.7: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno vedanaṃyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:4.11: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno viññāṇameva anussarati.
sn22.79:5.4: Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati, ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi ruppati.
sn22.79:6.4: Sukhampi vedayati, dukkhampi vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedayati.
sn22.79:7.4: Nīlampi sañjānāti, pītakampi sañjānāti, lohitakampi sañjānāti, odātampi sañjānāti.
sn22.79:8.4: Rūpaṃ rūpattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, vedanaṃ vedanattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, saññaṃ saññattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, saṅkhāre saṅkhārattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti, viññāṇaṃ viññāṇattāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharonti.
sn22.79:9.4: Ambilampi vijānāti, tittakampi vijānāti, kaṭukampi vijānāti, madhurampi vijānāti, khārikampi vijānāti, akhārikampi vijānāti, loṇikampi vijānāti, aloṇikampi vijānāti.
sn22.79:10.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.79:10.3: Atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:10.4: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ, anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:10.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṃ rūpasmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:10.7: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:11.2: Atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva vedanāya khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannāya vedanāya khajjāmi.
sn22.79:11.3: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ vedanaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ;
sn22.79:11.4: anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva vedanāya khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannāya vedanāya khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:11.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītāya vedanāya anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:11.7: paccuppannāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:12.3: Atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva saṅkhārehi khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannehi saṅkhārehi khajjāmīti.
sn22.79:12.4: Ahañceva kho pana anāgate saṅkhāre abhinandeyyaṃ;
sn22.79:12.5: anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva saṅkhārehi khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannehi saṅkhārehi khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:12.6: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītesu saṅkhāresu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:12.8: paccuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:13.2: Atītampi addhānaṃ evameva viññāṇena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena viññāṇena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:13.3: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ viññāṇaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ;
sn22.79:13.4: anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva viññāṇena khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena viññāṇena khajjāmī’ti.
sn22.79:13.5: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṃ viññāṇasmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:13.7: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:14.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.79:14.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.79:14.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn22.79:14.13: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.79:14.15: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn22.79:14.18: “Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ:
sn22.79:14.19: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.79:14.24: yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ:
sn22.79:14.25: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.79:15.1: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako apacināti, no ācināti;
sn22.79:16.1: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi …
sn22.79:16.8: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.79:17.1: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti.
sn22.79:17.2: Vidhūpetvā ṭhito kiñca nevācināti na apacināti?
sn22.79:17.3: Apacinitvā ṭhito rūpaṃ nevācināti na apacināti;
sn22.79:17.8: Apacinitvā ṭhito kiñca neva pajahati na upādiyati?
sn22.79:17.9: Pajahitvā ṭhito rūpaṃ neva pajahati na upādiyati;
sn22.79:17.14: Pajahitvā ṭhito kiñca neva visineti na ussineti?
sn22.79:17.15: Visinetvā ṭhito rūpaṃ neva visineti na ussineti;
sn22.79:17.20: Visinetvā ṭhito kiñca neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti?
sn22.79:17.21: Vidhūpetvā ṭhito rūpaṃ neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti;
sn22.79:17.26: Vidhūpetvā ṭhito evaṃvimuttacittaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā ārakāva namassanti:
